summary: Cooper Flagg is a developmental prospect with intriguing physical tools and flashes of promising potential at the collegiate level. The 6'9" forward displays a strong combination of size, length, and athleticism, which allows him to make an impact on both ends of the court. As he continues to refine his skills and gain more experience against top competition, Flagg has the foundation to develop into a solid contributor or even a primary option in the right system.
